name: False Life
components: V, S, M (a drop of blood)
duration: 1 hour/level or until discharged; see text
text: You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid death. While this spell is in effect, you gain temporary hit points equal to 1d10 + 1 per caster level (maximum +10).
mythicText: The temporary hit points gained increase to 2d8 + 2 per caster level (maximum +20). As an immediate action, you can dismiss the remaining duration of the spell to prevent 1 point of Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage per 10 temporary hit points remaining from the spell. This takes effect after the attack hits you and the damage is rolled, but before you take the damage. For example, if you have 22 temporary hit points from mythic false life and a wyvern stings you for 3 points of Constitution damage, you can dismiss the spell to prevent 2 points of Constitution damage from that attack.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一滴血)
duration_zh: 1小时/等级 或 直至能量发散; 见文本
text_zh: 通过驾驭死灵之力，你让自身获得能够在一定限度内避免死亡的能力。在该法术生效时，你获得 {1d10+CL (最高+10)} 的临时HP。
mythicText_zh: 法术所赋予的暂时生命值增加至2d8 + 每施法者等级2点（最高+20）。以直觉动作，你能够解消剩余持续时间内的法术，法术每剩余10点暂时生命值，就能防止1点力量、敏捷或体质伤害。这会在攻击命中你并且已经投掷伤害检定之后，并且你受到伤害之前生效。例如：若你从神话虚假生命法术获得的暂时生命值还剩22点，然后双足飞龙（wyvern）的毒刺对你造成3点体质伤害，那么您能够解消法术并防止此次攻击造成的2点体质伤害。
